translations: v.没收；扣押；交由财产受托人保管；宣布……破产（sequestrate 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Plant net primary production (NPP) of agriculture vegetation represents the capacity of sequestrating atmospheric CO2 in agro-ecosystem, and plays an important role in terrestrial carbon cycling.
sentences.translation: 农业植被净初级生产力代表了农田生态系统固定大气co_2的能力，是陆地生态系统碳循环的重要组成部分。
